content: द्वय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Two-fold, double, of two kinds or sorts; अनुपेक्षणे द्वयी गतिः <ls>Mu. 3</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 104</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; sometimes used in <ab>pl.</ab> also; see <ls>Śi. 3. 57.</ls> --यं {@--1@} Pair, couple, brace; (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); द्वितयेन द्वयमेव संगतं <ls>R. 8. 6</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 19</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 8</ls>; <ls n="R.">4. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Two fold nature, duplicity. {@--3@} Untruthfulness. {@--4@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The masculine and feminine gender. --यी A pair, couple.
